title: Broads leveling problems
body: So, I made this account for the RP area and I got it to level 5 like it asked, but I'm still unable to post because it doesn't realize that I'm level 5. Is there anyway I can get it fixed?

replies.body: It actually looks like you've resolved this by posting this discussion, causing a manual sync of your Boards and Summoner profiles. Happy posting! ^.^
